cinnamon.engine.object

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.object.Room

  • public class Room
extends Object

    Defines a game area with a background image.

      • Room

        public Room(Game.Resources resources,
            float width,
            float height,
            int background,
            String name)

        Constructor for a Room.

        Parameters:
        resources - resources.
        width - Room's width.
        height - Room's height.
        background - texture id.
        name - identifying name.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if width or height <= 0 or the given name is null, length() == 0, or is only whitespace.

        public final boolean contains(GameObjectManager.GObject object)

        Checks whether or not a GameObjectManager.GObject's bounding box is completely inside the Room.

        Parameters:
        object - GObject.
        Returns:
        true if the GObject is fully inside the Room.
